---
title: "About me"
---

My main responsibilities at [Swisstransplant](https://www.swisstransplant.org/) are risk prediction in organ transplantation, developing novel tools to assist quality control, and statistical reporting of the transplantation activity in Switzerland.

I am also a member of the scientific committee of the [Swiss Transplant Cohort Study (STCS)](https://www.stcs.ch/) and a founding member of the interest group [Statistics in Organ Transplantation (SOT)](https://sites.google.com/view/statistics-in-transplantation/startseite).

## Interests

* Clinical prediction models
* Statistical methods for quality control
* Statistical reporting in organ transplantation
* Statistical programming (R)
* Data visualization and analytics dashboards
* Good research practice
* Reproducible data analysis and reporting

## Private
I am married and a father of a son (born 2021).
